tool_description: Expands a single verse or short passage by providing surrounding context to ensure proper interpretation within its literary unit.

reference.description: Specific verse or short passage reference to expand

context_range.description: Range of context: paragraph, chapter, section, or book

include_outline.description: Include structural outline of the expanded context

error_messages: Invalid reference: Provide a valid scripture reference in standard format.
Invalid context range: Use one of [paragraph, chapter, section, book].
Reference too broad: This tool is designed for expanding single verses or short passages.
usage: Provide a specific verse reference and optionally specify the range of context to include. Returns the verse with appropriate surrounding text and structural analysis.

original_reference.description: The original verse or passage provided

expanded_reference.description: The full reference range of expanded context

context_text.description: The expanded text with original passage highlighted

structural_outline.description: Outline of the literary structure if requested

context_explanation.description: Explanation of how context affects interpretation
